summary: This script utilizes xdotool, a tool for automating the X Window System, to move the mouse cursor to position (1,1), simulate a left click, and type the character sequence "123". It is likely used for UI automation or assistive purposes.

details.comment: This script utilizes xdotool, a tool for automating the X Window System, to move the mouse cursor to position (1,1), simulate a left click, and type the character sequence "123". It is likely used for UI automation or assistive purposes.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
export DISPLAY=:1
xdotool mousemove 1 1 click 1
xdotool type 123
